FAQ

  1. What is Chimera?

    To know more about it, please visit our about page.

  2. When is Chimera 2024 scheduled?

    Chimera 2024 will be held on 30th and 31th March, 2024. Please checkout our events page for more details.

  3. Who can participate?

    Chimera is a blend of technical as well as non-technical events. Go through the events list to find your pick.

  4. Can I get a schedule of all the events to be held at Chimera 2024?

    Yes, you can find a list of all the events at our events page with detailed descriptions.

  5. What is the participation cost?

    Nothing! Admission is completely free, and shall include cool merchandise and enormous cash prizes!

  6. Will non-STEM students be able to participate in the events?

    Yes, every student is encouraged to participate in our events. They are open to all, doesn't matter if your background is in STEM or not.

  7. Do I need a team, or can I participate individually?

    Chimera 2024 has a blend of team-based events, alongside events where you can show off your indivdual talents. Registration processes for each may vary. Please checkout our events page for more details.

  8. Is there online registration for events?

    Yes, you need to get registered online in order to participate in Chimera. You can register in different events form here.

  9. How should I reach Ashoka University?

    Get directions on Google Maps.
    For further travel details, you can view this document.

  10. I have a question that was not answered here. What do I do?

    You can drop your queries at ieee.asb@ashoka.edu.in.
    We have also provided event specific details and contacts on their respective pages.
